Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2013 06:09PM jeni72 wrote: pathology came back clean and no more cancer. 2..1 " idc in the right and 3 ..under.8 fibroadenomas in the left. Lobes and margins clear. First fill tomorrow ..already had 250cc during surgery. Wondering how much he will do tomorrow. I did a bad thing yesterday and am really paying for it .. I just needed to wash so badly....so I filled the tub a few inches and washed as best I could , then had my daughter wash my hair while I was on my hands and knees...o..m..g...swelling and tightness is much worse. So don't do that ladies!!!!! I don't think any drains will come out tomorrow but I pray for it...maybe next week. Annika....yeaaaaaa! Congratulations sweety! Paloverde best wishes tomorrow Hezzr and laurievp glad your surgeries went well ..I was also a 4.5 surg Swimmom we are in the same boat tomorrow

Posts.Content: Dec 19, 2013 02:23PM jeni72 wrote: hi ladies!! I'm with y'all with the crying...yesterday really bad..got yelled at by the doctor for doing too much( when I actually feel like I have done nothing). Said my drain on the left is getting air when I lift my arm(bulb inflates when I lift my arm) and most likely will have drain for awhile. Actually feeling much worse than a week ago. But other than that all is well. Still haven't made the app.with the oncologist either..just can't for some reason.  Swimmom2..I have the same..was pretty worried too because its a sign of ibc...but the doctor wasn't concerned. On my left side the scar is black with a dime size brown discolored part..dr. said it was from lack of oxygen during surgery. Have you heard of this? Njmom....hope all goes well tomorrow and please do take it as easy as you can!!! Do plan on a wonderful holiday with your family ....just try to take it easy. Prayers, Love and hugs to all of us criers this week...to upcoming surgeries too!

Posts.Content: Dec 31, 2013 07:08PM jeni72 wrote: Merry christmas and happy new year to all! I haven't been on for a while.. been pretending this is all a bad dream. Had the last 2 of 4 drains Monday. SO MUCH FREEDOM! Lol Am still having much pain and still use pain pills at nite. Tylenol during the day. I read on a post that the black scab is bad? Mine are black and I had a ton of brusing, the doctor won't take sutures or give me a fill. He said I was healing fine.  I also had a fill of 250 cc at surgery. Is that a lot? Not going to see my onco till jan 20. Everyone seems to know their stage and grade and cell... none of my doctors have told me. I feel stupid. I had 2 carsonomas both about 1.9 cm in my cancer side and 4 adenomas all over 2cm on my noncancer side. Nodes and margins were clear. I definitly have the iron bra feeling and my ribs are super sore. Can't look over shoulder either for driving cause my sternum hurts to the point of tears . My arm pits feel like I am holding tennis balls in them, can't tell if I am swollen because in the past 6 months I have put on 30lbs and look like a cow with no boobs. I am taking things pretty well I think.lol The hubs and the kids have been so great and I truly couldn't have done this without them...but you ladies have pulled me through...made me comfortable in my skin again and you truly know what I am going through.  I pray for the new year to bring all of you health, wealth and happiness... all my love and prayers...jeni
Posts.Title: December 2013 surgeries bobogirl sandra4611

Posts.Content: Dec 15, 2013 02:20PM jeni72 wrote: carebear..my thoughts and prayers are with you to get rid of the infection (((hugs))) I had 2drains out Friday and did my happy I am clean shower dance. But oh holy moley are my armpits and shoulder blades so friggan sore...its been a very bad day!!! My husband wants me to take 2 of the percocets again but like a previous comment I get the blurry vision. My one drain is getting air too...so the suction isn't working right. Still not used to my frankenstein boobies yet but once they get another fill I will feel more like myself. Thoughts,prayers,and hugs to this weeeks surgeries and everyone postop!

Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2014 09:29PM jeni72 wrote: i seen a t shirt the other day on facebook that said"hell yes their fake, my real ones tried to kill me".... I laughed so hard and ordered one!  Saying a prayer for dancermom(kathy) and booboogirl...haven't heard from them in a while. Hope all is going well. Trying like hell to stay up beat and stay out of the bad funk I have been in! Went to walmart for some sports bras today , I found some by fruit of the loom (2 in a pack) , super soft and stretchy, I tjink they were $12. Then there are these pushup inserts there for $5 , I was a d cup, and will be a c by spring.... with these things I am a small b. Not bad!! Plus they are water...so I through them in the freezer...helped with my swelling! It has been a good day.

My drains haven't been a problem but I know I can't shower with them in...so I hate them..lol I have had a lot of itchy feeling on my chest above the no boobies up my neck..can't itch cause omg it hurts. And nerve pain in arms that comes and goes. All seems well right now. Velle...hope surgery goes well and to all my other dec. Ladies...my love hugs and prayers for each and everyone of you...and thank you for being here for eachother . Jeni
Posts.Title: December 2013 surgeries bobogirl sandra4611

Posts.Content: Jan 4, 2014 09:40AM jeni72 wrote: i too was wondering about booboo, prayer she is well. I worked about 48-72 hours aweek, and the people I work with are mostly men. They were outstanding when I told them, Well I told my shift. We are like family, I had already been dealing with this for about 3 months , then got the dx, (sept30) , I still didn't tell only but my boss and my work partner. Then more tests, and then schedualing the surgeries. Took all about 6months . I really have been wanting to go back, but I am not the same, afraid of the looks and everything. I did have a break down with one of my wind up guys about 2 weeks before surgery, he was one who kept reminding me of how strong I am and I had nothing to worry about...I started crying and told him I am not that strong and I am so tired of this and I haven't even begun the fight yet. He cried too...he is one of my best friends and i felt bad that I made him cry. He didn't bring it up again unless I did.

Since I don't have drains I can do my stretches , and I know I push it some days, have any of you felt this? Our artic blizzard has been in full force and everything has been closed. Was supposed to have stitches removed and first fill, and was going to see what this was ,but my luck has been bad luck lately.

Posts.Content: Dec 10, 2013 07:08PM jeni72 wrote: some crying today from thhe new look but I knoow it won't stay this way...I was a d cup and now an a cup and breast bone is different more boney I guess. Fisrt fill will be Friday and maybe 2 of the 4drains will be removed. I do feel pain when the hubs strips the drains but not to bad. Cried when my youngest casey jane15 did them too just because she has to see me like this. I am missing my sister and dad today something fierce.. they aren't able to visit because of weather. I wish my mom was with me too today..she always knew what to say and do. Levessal--- you won't see anything for 24 hours... well I didn't...yes I was shocked but my dr was with me supporting me ..he is a blessing. Once the pain and comfort is addressed that's when you think about the look. Hope everything goes well for you my prayers love and hugs Hopeing sandra has a better day tomorrow and if not we are here honey...love prayers and hugs to all my fighters with me today

Posts.Content: Jan 3, 2014 07:43PM jeni72 wrote: sandra so glad to hear about your results!! You must feel a little relief!  So many of you are returning to work and I am shocked, tomorrow will be week 4 since my bmx w/ tes and I am positive I would not be able to perform even light duty. My driving isn't even up to par yet, lol . I am having extreme tightness in my chest , just above my insisions , especially in the evening. And to complicate , I have started my daily sneezing! OMG!   There is no coming back from the sneeze. If I was normal and would only sneeze 1 or 2 times I would be ok...but around the 5th or 6th time in a row , I am crying.  Was thinking I might do some bra shopping at the walmart tomorrow, was online today looking and they are in store so might as well get out while the roads are plowed! My ps is sending me to a cancer bra place next week, for a rx bra...I will let y'all know about it when I get the info. Bless y'all ! Love and prayers   jeni
